snippet.title: I am an Air Traffic Controller 4  DLC : Airport NAGOYA [RJGG] on STEAM - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.technobrain.com/atc4_g/nagoya/

STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2659940/ATC4_Airport_NAGOYA_RJGG/
*A new airport has been added to "I am an Air Traffic Controller 4"

ATC4 Original Sound Track (streaming)
https://linkco.re/uz193R8p?lang=en

[Airport Covered]
Built as an airline hub capable of operating 24 hours a day on an artificial island in Ise Bay, Chubu Centrair International Airport(NGO/RJGG) is used by domestic as well as Asian and European airlines. It is designed for operational efficiency, with taxiways functionally positioned to efficiently connect the runways with the passenger terminals.

[Appearance by a “Dreamlifter” Large Cargo Freighter]
In Japan, Dreamlifter (747-400 LCF) can only be seen at Centrair, and it makes an impressive appearance in the game!

[Virtually experience the hugely popular runway observation tour]
Virtually experience Centrair’s massively popular runway observation tour thanks to a moving camera, included for the first time! View the airport and aircraft just like when riding the bus.

#ATC #aviation #game #IamanAirTrafficController4 #IamanAirTrafficController #ATC4
